title: FS: Low Grade 20 Card T206 Lot **SOLD**
author: marcdelpercio

posts.post_title: FS: Low Grade 20 Card T206 Lot **SOLD**
posts.post_content:
**LOT HAS BEEN SOLD**  Thanks to all who were interested.

Hello.  I have the following 20 card T206 lot available for sale.  As you can see in the scans, this is a low grade lot and most of these cards have significant condition issues such as paper loss/damage, trimming, heavy creasing, etc.  As I'm sure you've noticed, the prices on even very low grade T206's and especially lots have been steadily climbing lately.  

I'm asking $275 delivered for this lot.  I accept payment via any method you prefer.  If I don't have any takers on the entire lot after a day or two, I will price the cards individually.  Cards included are as follows:

Beck
Bescher
CLARKE (HOF, Sovereign back)
Davis
Devlin
Donovan
Doolin
GANDIL
Hofman
F. Jones
Killian
Knight
Merritt
H. Moran
O'Neil
Schmidt
Seymour
Turner
Unglaub
D. White

Thanks for looking and please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] with any questions.
